tool_description:
You can now confidently onboard vehicles and individuals knowing that the vehicle is genuine, registered by an RTO, and associated with a specific individual.

Vehicle RC verification API helps to establish a link between the vehicle and its owner, thereby minimizing the potential for fraud.
name: Vehicle RC Verification
title: Vehicle RC Verification

api_list.name: Vehicle RC Verification
api_list.description:
You can now confidently onboard vehicles and individuals knowing that the vehicle is genuine, registered by an RTO, and associated with a specific individual.

Vehicle RC verification API helps to establish a link between the vehicle and its owner, thereby minimizing the potential for fraud.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-rc-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_rc_basic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-rc-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-rc-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_rc_basic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
